nm(pix).S: List of coefficients to perform Semisphere pix to nm calculations
nm(pix).Z: List of coefficients to perform Zenith pix to nm calculations

description.pix_interval: Quantity of pixels to perform spectr interval around one pixel

polynom.mu_end: Mu value to end calculations. Default 12
polynom.mu_intervals: Mu interval conditions to use different polynoms mu=[3, 5]
polynom.mu_start: First mu in ozone table. Default 1
polynom.mu_step: Mu step to make table of ozone by polynom

description.sigma_count: Standard Square Deviation Sigma quantity for correct ozone calculations
description.sko_D: Standard Square Deviation of Dark spectr
description.sko_ZaD: Standard Square Deviation of ZD or SD spectr
description.uva_koef: Hard coefficient for uva value print
description.uvb_koef: Hard coefficient for uvb value print
description.uve_koef: Hard coefficient for uve value print

description.kzLarger1: List of coefficients. Can be unlimited
description.kzLess1: List of coefficients. Can be unlimited
description.kz_obl1: List of coefficients. Can be unlimited
description.kzLarger2: List of coefficients. Can be unlimited
description.kzLess2: List of coefficients. Can be unlimited
description.kz_obl2: List of coefficients. Can be unlimited
description.pix+-: Quantity of pixels to perform spectr interval around one pixel (left and right)
description.visible_sunheight_min: Minimum sun height of data to show on chart and to be used in daily mean calculation
description.visible_sunheight_max: Maximum sun height of data to show on chart and to be used in daily mean calculation

description.D: Name of Dark channel to print in console
description.S: Name of Semisphere channel to print in console
description.Z: Name of Zenith channel to print in console

description.accummulate: Quantity of measurements on UFOS to get mean spectr
description.amplitude_max: Maximum amplitude value of spectr which can accepted
description.amplitude_min: Minimum amplitude value of spectr which can accepted
description.auto_expo_max: Maximum exposition if auto measurements do
description.auto_expo_min: Minimum exposition if auto measurements do (first measurement in set)
description.channel: Names and order of channels to perform measurements
description.graduation_expo: Graduation exposition to get atmospheric values of spectr
description.manual_expo: auto_exposition=0. List of expositions to perform set of measurements

description.interval: Time interval in minutes between measurements
description.sun_height_min: Sun height of the first and the last measurement
